projects.title: Amaano
projects.description: Amaano is one platform to manage your online transactions and social interactions. At Amaano, we combine the wisdom and practice from the traditional payment system with the Digital Age. We think strategically and clear about what our ultimate objectives are. We have accomplished an amazing amount of important work and we are obsessed with following through.

projects.title: Active Pro
projects.description: Active Pro is a progress tracking tool that can be used by anyone looking to advance their skills! -In the Student/Client login the user can communicate with their instructors, log practices and performances, upload videos and pictures, keep a monthly calendar, receive reminders by push notifications, and set goals! -In the Student/Client login the user can communicate with their instructors, log practices and performances, upload videos and pictures, keep a monthly calendar, receive reminders by push notifications, and set goals!
